title: Suggestion: Revoke ranked rewards of "season's over, time to troll" players.
body:
No, I don't mean players who simply aren't taking ranked seriously, or not playing their best, or making unconventional picks, or whatever. I'm talking about people who have already received their ranked rewards and are now going into ranked with the intention of losing just for fun, and because there are now little to no consequences (they got their gold/plat/diamond border, so what do they care if they throw a few games here and there?).

[I'm talking about stuff like this.](http://imgur.com/a/dDIzn)

I'm sending these screenshots (uncensored of course) in a support ticket and this guy will probably get banned, but it'd be pretty nice if Riot could implement a policy or something stating that behavior like this will get the ranked rewards you just earned taken away.

People apply different amounts of value to different things in life. What you might find worthwhile or "having an impact on your future" might not be the same things that other people value.

Playing this game will surely impact someone's future. They might play this game and then get interested in improving the game, and then go work for Riot, and then make a career out of it that can effect the rest of their life.

Maybe someone plays this game instead of going for a walk, and had they gone for a walk, they would have been hit by a drunk driver that veered off the road and killed them. That would have definitely impacted their future.

Maybe some guy plays this game and makes a friend... and then he finds out the friend is a girl and then they find out they like each other a lot, meet up, and end up getting married and having kids and living a great life together.

Maybe some guy plays this game and gets really good, goes on to compete in the LCS, becomes the best LoL player of all time and goes on to live a life of fame and fortune.

But yeah dude, it's just a game that has no impact on your future.

The only person with a sad perspective on life is you. Every little thing in your life can have an impact on your future. If you seriously think some hobbies or activities have ZERO value or impact on your life, then you are blatantly ignorant.

Im actually the guy in the screenies. I'm not trying to justify what I did, but at the time I had repeatedly been trolled in numerous ranked games and was getting more and more frustrated. In that particular game, I was with the karthus last game (he played trynd mid, fed, then started following me in my jungle), and he raged during that game and afk'ed and trolled, even though we all begged him not to. When I re-queued and got stuck with him AGAIN, and saw that he was going to troll with a karthus smite/teleport jungle, I pretty much just lost it and decided to troll him back. 

Sure, it was just revenge, but at the time that's all I wanted. In hindsight, sure it was a bit petty, and I was reciprocating behavior that had repeatedly been done to me during end of season, but at the time it was extremely satisfying to troll then person who had trolled me - cause you know, karma's a bitch. 

Anyway, I'm not saying what I did was right, but if I'm getting trolled in so many of my games then obviously there is something wrong with the ranked queues during the end of season.

Riot can ban me if they want, because honestly the game is just not fun right now, I haven't bought rp in ages, and I really feel like I could use a break from the game.
